attributes.action: to persuade Max Mosely the FIA president to tender his reignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to get Gordon Brown to use his influence as Prime Minister to persuade Max Mosley to step down as the president of the FIA before he makes sports like F1 a complete farce. For too long now Max has been far too opinionated about others, not the characteristics we want to see from the FIA president...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
